description:
Eve is a young girl, who is a genetically engineered bio-weapon. She is able to use nanotechnology to transform her body into various offensive and defensive weapons.
http://anidb.net/ch2357 [Konjiki no Yami] from the http://anidb.net/a5625 [To Love-Ru] series, another of http://anidb.net/cr2985 [Yabuki Kentaro]`s works, and her are alternative reality versions of each other.
name: Eve
